MLI API Data¶

This chapter describes the data formats, data layouts and data structures that are used in the MLI API. Data formats are the different ways of quantizing and storing of data elements into a container. The data layouts describe how these elements are stored in a multi-dimensional array in memory. The data structures describe how function parameters are grouped into structures.

  • Data Formats
    • Fixed Point Category
    • Asymmetric Integral category
    • Quantization: Influence of Accumulator Bit Depth
  • Data Layouts
    • MLI Data layout (HWCN)
    • Changing the Data Layout of Three-Dimensional Tensors
  • Data Structures
    • mli_tensor Structure
    • mli_data_container Structure
    • mli_element_type Enumeration
    • mli_element_params Union
    • mli_lut Structure
    • Kernel Specific Configuration Structures
  • Error Codes
  • Debug Modes
